short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be informed when the algorithms behind some of the world's most popular websites make new observations about you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FORTYEIGHT Observer (Beta) works in real-time to detect when the algorithms behind some of the worldâ€™s most popular websites make new observations about you. The privacy-preserving browser extension spots when specific topics or content are being recommended to you, instantly updating your FORTYEIGHT account to provide you with real-time insights and alerts.
